LOBBYINGDISCLOSURE2.organizationName: ASSOCIATION OF THE UNITED STATES ARMY, (INC.)
LOBBYINGDISCLOSURE2.clientName: ASSOCIATION OF THE UNITED STATES ARMY, (INC.)
LOBBYINGDISCLOSURE2.printedName: Jerry L. Sinn, Lieutenant General, USA(R), VP Finance & Administration

specific_issues.description:
Mr. John Gifford (Director - Government Affairs, AUSA) met with LTG Tony Ierardi (J-8) regarding Military Healthcare modernization. (1/11/16)
Mr. John Gifford (Director - Government Affairs, AUSA) endorsed TMC Testimony regarding commissary reform which was presented to the HASC subcommittee on Personnel. (1/13/16)
Mr. John Gifford (Director - Government Affairs, AUSA) met with MG Richard Thomas (Director, DHA Healthcare Operations Directorate) regarding Military Healthcare modernization. (1/20/16)
Mr. John Gifford (Director - Government Affairs, AUSA) met with MG John Ferrari (Army PA&E) regarding the Future of the Army Commission; Future Force; Military Healthcare modernization; FY17 Budget themes. (1/28/16)
Mr. John Gifford (Director - Government Affairs, AUSA) met with Bob Simmons (Staff Director - HASC) regarding the Future of the Army Commission; endstrength; military healthcare; military retirement; Army budget. (2/2/16)
Mr. John Gifford (Director - Government Affairs, AUSA) endorsed a TMC letter addressed to Rep. Alan Grayson regarding H.R. 4519. (2/11/16)
Mr. John Gifford (Director - Government Affairs, AUSA) met with MG John Ferrari (Army PA&E) regarding the Army budget over time. (2/17/16)
Julie C. Rudowski (Asst. Director - Government Affairs, AUSA), in her weekly Legislative News Update, urged AUSA members to send a web based letter to their Congressional delegation regarding the POSTURE Act (HR4534). (2/25/16)
Mr. John Gifford (Director - Government Affairs, AUSA) met with Rep. Chris Gibson & Nick Czajka (Legislative Asst.) regarding the POSTURE Act (HR4534). (2/29/16)
Mr. John Gifford (Director - Government Affairs, AUSA) met with Courtney Carrow (LD, Congresswoman Stefanik) regarding the POSTURE Act (HR4534). (3/1/16)
Mr. John Gifford (Director - Government Affairs, AUSA) met with DeWayne Blackmon (Defense Fellow, Congressman Walz) regarding the POSTURE Act (HR4534). (3/1/16)
Mr. John Gifford (Director - Government Affairs, AUSA) met with Annie Yea (LD, Congresswoman Loretta Sanchez) regarding the POSTURE Act (HR4534). (3/1/16)
Mr. John Gifford (Director - Government Affairs, AUSA) met Morris Greene (MLA, Congressman Mike Turner) regarding the POSTURE Act (HR4534). (3/1/16)
Mr. John Gifford (Director - Government Affairs, AUSA) submitted AUSA testimony for the record regarding veterans issues which was presented before a joint hearing of the House & Senate Veterans Affairs Committee. (3/3/16)
General Gordon R. Sullivan (Ret.) (CEO & President, AUSA) sent a letter to Rep. Chris Gibson & Rep. Mike Turner thanking them for introducing and offering support for the POSTURE Act - HR4534. (3/3/16)
SMA Ken Preston (Ret.) (Director of Noncommissioned Officer & Soldier Programs, AUSA) submitted testimony regarding military healthcare issues which was presented to the HASC subcommittee on Personnel. (3/17/16)
Mr. John Gifford (Director - Government Affairs, AUSA) endorsed TMC Testimony regarding FY17 DoD Budget Proposals on Military Healthcare which was presented to the HASC subcommittee on Personnel. (3/17/16)
Mr. John Gifford (Director - Government Affairs, AUSA) met with LTG Nadja West (Army Surgeon General) regarding Military Healthcare modernization. (3/25/16)
Mr. John Gifford (Director - Government Affairs, AUSA) met with VADM Raquel "Rocky" Bono (Director, DHA) regarding Military Healthcare modernization. (3/28/16)

ali_info.federal_agencies: U.S. SENATE, U.S. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, Army - Dept of (Other)
